sentence: The in room entertainment is currently receiving a re fresh with new tvs which was good to notice as this was the only slight aspect of the room I felt let it down but on my next visit it sounds like I will have nothing to be negative about
That is certainly an aspect the hotel management should be proud about
1st experience at the Mandarin but not the last
We were not disappointed by any aspect of this hotel
The breakfast atmosphere was good but with no big variety and the some pf breakfast staff were not eager to serve and took a long time to bring the coffee and eggs
The surrounding is just not the levelI will make the photos and add
I think they should make the ambiance more comfortable and one where you want to stay
MO Bar expensive and lacks ambiance
I also found the servers although nice and polite to be somewhat young and seemed to lack sone experience to work in this establishment category

I still feel breakfast is somewhat overpriced for what I personally would be willing to pay and I did opt for the local cafes on my way to work but having sampled the dinner experience I am sure the quality provided would match and be superb
The hotel is located centrally near to all of the attractions that you might want to visit and I had views over the river to top off the experience
Thank you Mandarin Oriental and Geofrey for a great experience
We never felt rushed and thoroughly enjoyed the atmosphere
Overall good experience and I would recommend
Definitely do not miss the room service great offer with large choice and 24hours open really unique experience
Excellent experience and thank you once again
Mandarin luxury in a Swiss setting
It was our first time staying at the Mandarin in Geneva so we were looking forward to the experience
I really enjoyed stayinh that nice hotel
From far the very best hotel experience I hadThe concept for the new Ceviche restaurant is just in line with the overall distinctive and refined experience
